about_the_game:
MULTIPLAYER CAR CHASE. You work for an electricity company, and you have been sent to retrieve the Covex19 Crystal. You must battle 9 other drivers in a fast paced, action packed Battle Royale, involving car chases and gun-combat in order to extract the crystal for your company.

You can:
    Customise your characterCustomise weaponsShoot at carsDestroy carsCrash CarsWin engaging, physics-based car chasesSend in HelicoptersForm and break alliancesand ultimately, be the last one standing

The game uses simcade handling for the cars. Each car can be destroyed piece by piece, breaking off doors, smashing glass and snapping wheels!
